========================================================

The Walking Dead is a television series based on the comic strip of the same name publicaada by Image Comics. The series premiered in the U.S. on October 31, 2010, the same day that is celebrated on Haloween. In Portugal and Brazil, the premiere took place on November 2 of that year, the Fox channel. In the show, find out what life is like on Earth after a zombie apocalypse, where the vast majority of the earth's population has been infected by a mysterious virus that turns them into undead. The few humans who survived the epidemic must now unite to find a new home, away from zumbis.O group is led by Rick Grimes (Andrew Lincoln), a cop who woke alone in a hospital surrounded by undead and now seeks his wife, Lori (Sarah Wayne Callies), and son. He joins Shane (Jon Bernthal), his former partner in the police; Andrea (Lauren Holden), one of two sisters who escaped the plague; Glenn (Steven Yeun), a street sweeper experienced, among other humans equally frightened that struggle to escape the virus.
